entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
